name: I Want to Become Fondue
description:
I Want to Become Fondue by

Jesse Lloyd-Dominik
Max Kearney
David Dam
with music By Russel Hodges

I Want to Become Fondue was made as part of a very relaxed and poorly planned post-semester game jam (the jam didn't even end up with an itch page).

The theme was "Your Happy Place"

Cheese Man's "happy place" is chilling in a pot of fondue. He has the pot, but no fondue. Brutally murder the other members of cheese village, throw them in the pot, light the pot, and take a fondue dip.

Controls:

[WASD/Left Stick] - Movement/Climb

[SPACE/South Face Button] - Jump

[ENTER/Right Trigger] - Pick up/Throw (Hold and release to throw harder)

Throw objects or the cheeses hard to damage them. Once they've died they can be added to the fondue pot.
